remarks: A subspace can be generated by restricted sets from a basis for the original topology.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
statement: tgrest $p |- ( ( B e. V /\ A e. W ) -> ( topGen ` ( B |`t A ) ) = ( ( topGen ` B ) |`t A ) ) $.
